attributes.action: designate Sky News, E4, More4, Film 4, Teachers TV and The Community Channel as PSBs.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: (In fact the Sec of State for Culture, Media and Sport) This would ensure that they are each carried in full on one of the three PSB Multiplexes of Digital Terrestrial Television after digital switch over.
